tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_90: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'I swear by this city, Makkah -',verse: 5893,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -',verse: 5894,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],',verse: 5895,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'We have certainly created man into hardship.',verse: 5896,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?',verse: 5897,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."',verse: 5898,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Does he think that no one has seen him?',verse: 5899,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'Have We not made for him two eyes?',verse: 5900,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'And a tongue and two lips?',verse: 5901,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'And have shown him the two ways?',verse: 5902,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'But he has not broken through the difficult pass.',verse: 5903,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?',verse: 5904,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'It is the freeing of a slave',verse: 5905,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'Or feeding on a day of severe hunger',verse: 5906,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'An orphan of near relationship',verse: 5907,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'Or a needy person in misery',verse: 5908,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: 'And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.',verse: 5909,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: 'Those are the companions of the right.',verse: 5910,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'But they who disbelieved in Our signs -  those are the companions of the left.',verse: 5911,},ayah_20: {image: '',text: 'Over them will be fire closed in.',verse: 5912,},name: surah_90,};
